author: ralexstokes
content:
interesting! i agree w/ the high-level idea that we should remove as much latency as possible from the builder network pathways -- it will never match/beat the local pathway but i expect it can get competitive enough to not matter much

the only real data points we have now are from the flashbots relay which is unfortunately closed source, i'm not sure to what extent there is low-hanging fruit we can remedy and i'm not sure if flashbots is willing to put additional resources into the mainnet relay relative to kiln

<@363800010518822915> do you mean that relays will gossip the unblinded block to help w/ propagation after it has been signed, or something else?
